en.bdb: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
The Lord is the emperor of the emperors, the truth and the beautiful
He, the great, is nonchalant and his mystery cannot be understood
His court is also anxiety free.
The feats of His powers are unfathomable and impervious.
His praise is true and the story of His eulogisation is undescribable.
I accept the true Guru wondrous and offer my life (for His truth).
Grandeur of the Primeval Lord
Millions of Brahmas, Visnus and Mahegas adore the Lord.
Narad, Saran and Sesanag eulogise Him.
The gams, gandharvas and Gana et al. play instruments (for Him).

verse.gurmukhi: iCA drsn kir vys sWg bxwiedy[
verse.unicode: ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨ ਕਰਿ ਵੇਸ ਸਾਂਗ ਬਣਾਇਦੇ।

en.bdb: The six philosophies also propound different garbs (for reaching Him).

transliteration.english: chhia dharasan kar ves saa(n)g banaidhe|
transliteration.hindi: छिअ दरसन करि वेस साँग बणाइदे।
transliteration.en: chhia dharasan kar ves saa(n)g banaidhe|
transliteration.hi: छिअ दरसन करि वेस साँग बणाइदे।
transliteration.ipa: ɕɪə d̪ərəsən kər ʋes sɑⁿəG bəɳɑeɪd̪e.
transliteration.ur: چھِا درسن کر وےس ساںگ بݨاادے۔

en.bdb: The gurus sermonize the disciples and the disciples act accordingly.

verse.gurmukhi: Awid purKu Awdysu pwr n pwiedy ]2]
verse.unicode: ਆਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਆਦੇਸੁ ਪਾਰ ਨ ਪਾਇਦੇ ॥੨॥

en.bdb: Salute to the primeval Lord who is unfathomable.

transliteration.english: aadh purakh aadhes paar na paidhe ||2||
transliteration.hindi: आदि पुरखु आदेसु पार न पाइदे ॥२॥
transliteration.en: aadh purakh aadhes paar na paidhe ||2||
transliteration.hi: आदि पुरखु आदेसु पार न पाइदे ॥२॥
transliteration.ipa: əɑd̪ pʊrəkʰ əɑd̪es pɑr nə pɑeɪd̪e.2.
transliteration.ur: آد پُرکھ آدےس پار ن پاادے ۔۔۲۔۔

en.bdb: Grandeur of the Primeval Lord
The pirs and paigambars (messengers of Lord) worship Him.
The shaikhs and many other worshippers remain in His shelter.

verse.gurmukhi: gaus kuqb keI loie dr bKsMdgI[
verse.unicode: ਗਉਸ ਕੁਤਬ ਕਈ ਲੋਇ ਦਰ ਬਖਸੰਦਗੀ।

en.bdb: The gaues and qutabs (spiritualists of Islam) of many places beg for His grace at His door.

transliteration.english: gaus kutab kiee loi dhar bakhasa(n)dhagee|
transliteration.hindi: गउस कुतब कई लोइ दर बखसंदगी।
transliteration.en: gaus kutab kiee loi dhar bakhasa(n)dhagee|
transliteration.hi: गउस कुतब कई लोइ दर बखसंदगी।
transliteration.ipa: Goʊs kʊt̪əb kei lɔeɪ d̪ər bəkʰəsəŋd̪əGi.
transliteration.ur: گاس کُتب کای لوا در بکھسںدگیِ۔

en.bdb: Dervishs in their trance stand at His gate to receive (alms from Him)

verse.gurmukhi: vlI aulh suix soie krin psMdgI[
verse.unicode: ਵਲੀ ਉਲਹ ਸੁਣਿ ਸੋਇ ਕਰਨਿ ਪਸੰਦਗੀ।

en.bdb: Listening to the praises of that Lord many walls also love Him.

transliteration.english: valee uleh sun soi karan pasa(n)dhagee|
transliteration.hindi: वली उलह सुणि सोइ करनि पसंदगी।
transliteration.en: valee uleh sun soi karan pasa(n)dhagee|
transliteration.hi: वली उलह सुणि सोइ करनि पसंदगी।
transliteration.ipa: ʋəli oʊləh sʊɳ sɔeɪ kərən pəsəŋd̪əGi.
transliteration.ur: ولیِ اُله سُݨ سوا کرن پسںدگیِ۔

en.bdb: A rare person of high fortune reaches His court.
People know not the works of  creator
People go on explaining disconnected rumours
But none of the Hindus and Muslims has identified the truth.
Only an humble person is accepted respectfully in the court of the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: vyd kqyb kurwxu n AKru jwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਵੇਦ ਕਤੇਬ ਕੁਰਾਣੁ ਨ ਅਖਰੁ ਜਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: The Vedas, katebas and the 'Qur'an (i.e. all the scriptures of world) also know not even a single word about Him.

transliteration.english: vedh kateb kuraan na akhar jaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: वेद कतेब कुराणु न अखरु जाणिआ।
transliteration.en: vedh kateb kuraan na akhar jaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: वेद कतेब कुराणु न अखरु जाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: ʋed̪ kət̪eb kʊrɑɳ nə əkʰər d͡ʒɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: وےد کتےب کُراݨ ن اکھر جاݨآ۔

en.bdb: The whole world is wonder-struck to see his wondrous deeds.
I am sacrifice unto that creator who Himself is the basic grandeur of His creation.

verse.gurmukhi: 5 : rsW dy p´wry mhl qoN dUr hn
verse.unicode: ੫ : ਰਸਾਂ ਦੇ ਪੵਾਰੇ ਮਹਲ ਤੋਂ ਦੂਰ ਹਨ

en.bdb: Pleasure seekers are away from His abode

transliteration.english: 5 : rasaa(n) dhe payeaare mahal to(n) dhoor han
transliteration.hindi: ५ : रसाँ दे प्यारे महल तों दूर हन
transliteration.en: 5 : rasaa(n) dhe payeaare mahal to(n) dhoor han
transliteration.hi: ५ : रसाँ दे प्यारे महल तों दूर हन
transliteration.ipa: 5 : rəsɑⁿ d̪e pəjɑre məhəl t̪ɔⁿ d̪ur hən
transliteration.ur: ۵ : رساں دے پےارے مهل توں دُور هن

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK rUp srUp AnUp isDwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਰੂਪ ਸਰੂਪ ਅਨੂਪ ਸਿਧਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions of beauteous persons come to and go from this world

transliteration.english: lakh lakh roop saroop anoop sidhaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख रूप सरूप अनूप सिधावही।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh roop saroop anoop sidhaavahee|
transliteration.hi: लख लख रूप सरूप अनूप सिधावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ rup sərup ənup sɪt̪ɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ رُوپ سرُوپ انُوپ سدھاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Millions of beauteous persons come to and go from this world and perform variegated activities.

verse.gurmukhi: rwg nwd ivsmwd gux iniD gwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਰਾਗ ਨਾਦ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਗੁਣ ਨਿਧਿ ਗਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: The rags (melodies) and nods (sounds) also being wonder-struck eulogise that ocean of attributes (the Lord).

transliteration.english: raag naadh visamaadh gun nidh gaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: राग नाद विसमाद गुण निधि गावही।
transliteration.en: raag naadh visamaadh gun nidh gaavahee|
transliteration.hi: राग नाद विसमाद गुण निधि गावही।
transliteration.ipa: rɑG nɑd̪ ʋɪsəmɑd̪ Gʊɳ nɪt̪ə̀ Gɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: راگ ناد وسماد گُݨ ندھ گاوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: rs ks lK suAwd ciK cKwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਰਸ ਕਸ ਲਖ ਸੁਆਦ ਚਖਿ ਚਖਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions taste and make others taste the edibles and inedibles.

transliteration.english: ras kas lakh suaadh chakh chakhaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: रस कस लख सुआद चखि चखावही।
transliteration.en: ras kas lakh suaadh chakh chakhaavahee|
transliteration.hi: रस कस लख सुआद चखि चखावही।
transliteration.ipa: rəs kəs ləkʰ sʊəɑd̪ t͡ʃəkʰ t͡ʃəkʰɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: رس کس لکھ سُآد چکھ چکھاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Crores of people manage to make others enjoy the fragrance and varied smells.

verse.gurmukhi: gYr mhil sulqwn mhl n pwvhI ]5]
verse.unicode: ਗੈਰ ਮਹਲਿ ਸੁਲਤਾਨ ਮਹਲ ਨ ਪਾਵਹੀ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: But those who consider the Lord of this (body) mansion as an alien, they all cannot attain His mansion.

transliteration.english: gair mahal sulataan mahal na paavahee ||5||
transliteration.hindi: गैर महलि सुलतान महल न पावही ॥५॥
transliteration.en: gair mahal sulataan mahal na paavahee ||5||
transliteration.hi: गैर महलि सुलतान महल न पावही ॥५॥
transliteration.ipa: Gær məhəl sʊlət̪ɑn məhəl nə pɑʋəhi.5.
transliteration.ur: گَےر مهل سُلتان مهل ن پاوهیِ ۔۔۵۔۔

en.bdb: Duality and unity

verse.gurmukhi: isv skqI dw mylu duibDw hoveI[
verse.unicode: ਸਿਵ ਸਕਤੀ ਦਾ ਮੇਲੁ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਹੋਵਈ।

en.bdb: The confluence of Siva and the Sakti is the root cause of this creation full of duality.

transliteration.english: siv sakatee dhaa mel dhubidhaa hoviee|
transliteration.hindi: सिव सकती दा मेलु दुबिधा होवई।
transliteration.en: siv sakatee dhaa mel dhubidhaa hoviee|
transliteration.hi: सिव सकती दा मेलु दुबिधा होवई।
transliteration.ipa: sɪʋ səkət̪i d̪ɑ mel d̪ʊbɪt̪ɑ hɔʋei.
transliteration.ur: سِو سکتیِ دا مےل دُبدھا هووای۔

verse.gurmukhi: qRYgux mwieAw Kylu Bir Bir DoveI[
verse.unicode: ਤ੍ਰੈਗੁਣ ਮਾਇਆ ਖੇਲੁ ਭਰਿ ਭਰਿ ਧੋਵਈ।

en.bdb: The maya with her three gunas (qualities – rajas, tamas and salty) plays her games and sometimes fills the man (with hopes and desires) and at another time empties him totally frustrating his plans.

transliteration.english: traigun maiaa khel bhar bhar dhoviee|
transliteration.hindi: त्रैगुण माइआ खेलु भरि भरि धोवई।
transliteration.en: traigun maiaa khel bhar bhar dhoviee|
transliteration.hi: त्रैगुण माइआ खेलु भरि भरि धोवई।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɹæGʊɳ mɑɪɑ kʰel ɓər ɓər t̪ɔʋei.
transliteration.ur: ترَےگݨ ماایا کھےل بھر بھرِ دھووای۔

en.bdb: Maya deludes people through the cyclic garlands of dharma, arth, cam and mokc (four supposed ideals of life) offered by her to man.
But man, the sum total of five elements, perishes ultimately.

verse.gurmukhi: iCA ruiq bwrh mwh his his roveI[
verse.unicode: ਛਿਅ ਰੁਤਿ ਬਾਰਹ ਮਾਹ ਹਸਿ ਹਸਿ ਰੋਵਈ।

en.bdb: The jiv (creature), laughs, weeps and wails during all the six seasons and twelve months of his life

transliteration.english: chhia rut baareh maeh has has roviee|
transliteration.hindi: छिअ रुति बारह माह हसि हसि रोवई।
transliteration.en: chhia rut baareh maeh has has roviee|
transliteration.hi: छिअ रुति बारह माह हसि हसि रोवई।
transliteration.ipa: ɕɪə rʊt̪ bɑrəh mɑh həs həs rɔʋei.
transliteration.ur: چھِا رُت باره ماه هس هسِ رووای۔

verse.gurmukhi: iriD isiD nv iniD nId n soveI ]6]
verse.unicode: ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਨਵ ਨਿਧਿ ਨੀਦ ਨ ਸੋਵਈ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: And imbued with the pleasures of the miraculous powers (given him by the Lord) never attains peace and equipoise.

transliteration.english: ridh sidh nav nidh needh na soviee ||6||
transliteration.hindi: रिधि सिधि नव निधि नीद न सोवई ॥६॥
transliteration.en: ridh sidh nav nidh needh na soviee ||6||
transliteration.hi: रिधि सिधि नव निधि नीद न सोवई ॥६॥
transliteration.ipa: rɪt̪ə̀ sɪt̪ə̀ nəʋ nɪt̪ə̀ nid̪ nə sɔʋei.6.
transliteration.ur: رِدھ سدھ نو ندھِ نیِد ن سووای ۔۔۶۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: 7 : Bwau Bgiq qoN ibnW Pokt hY
verse.unicode: ੭ : ਭਾਉ ਭਗਤਿ ਤੋਂ ਬਿਨਾਂ ਫੋਕਟ ਹੈ

en.bdb: Everything futile without loving devotion

transliteration.english: 7 : bhaau bhagat to(n) binaa(n) fokaT hai
transliteration.hindi: ७ : भाउ भगति तों बिनाँ फोकट है
transliteration.en: 7 : bhaau bhagat to(n) binaa(n) fokaT hai
transliteration.hi: ७ : भाउ भगति तों बिनाँ फोकट है
transliteration.ipa: 7 : ɓɑo ɓəGət̪ t̪ɔⁿ bɪnɑⁿ fɔkəʈ hæ
transliteration.ur: ۷ : بھاا بھگت توں بناں پھوکٹ هَے

verse.gurmukhi: shs isAwxp lK kMim n AwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਸਹਸ ਸਿਆਣਪ ਲਖ ਕੰਮਿ ਨ ਆਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions of skills make no avail.

transliteration.english: sahas siaanap lakh ka(n)m na aavahee|
transliteration.hindi: सहस सिआणप लख कंमि न आवही।
transliteration.en: sahas siaanap lakh ka(n)m na aavahee|
transliteration.hi: सहस सिआणप लख कंमि न आवही।
transliteration.ipa: səhəs sɪəɑɳəp ləkʰ kəŋm nə əɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: سهس سآݨپ لکھ کںم ن آوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: igAwn iDAwn aunmwnu AMqu n pwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਗਿਆਨ ਧਿਆਨ ਉਨਮਾਨੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Myriads of knowledges, concentrations and inferences are unable to know the mysteries of Lord.

transliteration.english: giaan dhiaan unamaan a(n)t na paavahee|
transliteration.hindi: गिआन धिआन उनमानु अंतु न पावही।
transliteration.en: giaan dhiaan unamaan a(n)t na paavahee|
transliteration.hi: गिआन धिआन उनमानु अंतु न पावही।
transliteration.ipa: Gɪəɑn t̪ɪəɑn oʊnəmɑn əŋt̪ nə pɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: گِآن دھآن اُنمان اںت ن پاوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: lK ssIAr lK Bwnu Aihinis D´wvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਸਸੀਅਰ ਲਖ ਭਾਨੁ ਅਹਿਨਿਸਿ ਧੵਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions of moons and suns adore Him day and night.

transliteration.english: lakh saseear lakh bhaan ahinis dhayeaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख ससीअर लख भानु अहिनिसि ध्यावही।
transliteration.en: lakh saseear lakh bhaan ahinis dhayeaavahee|
transliteration.hi: लख ससीअर लख भानु अहिनिसि ध्यावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ səsiər ləkʰ ɓɑn əhɪnɪs t̪əjɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ سسیِار لکھ بھان اهٍنس دھےاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: And millions of people remain imbued with humility.

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK grb gumwn lj ljwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਗਰਬ ਗੁਮਾਨ ਲਜ ਲਜਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions are worshipping the Lord according to their own religious traditions.

transliteration.english: lakh lakh garab gumaan laj lajaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख गरब गुमान लज लजावही।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh garab gumaan laj lajaavahee|
transliteration.hi: लख लख गरब गुमान लज लजावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ Gərəb Gʊmɑn ləd͡ʒ ləd͡ʒɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ گرب گُمان لج لجاوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK dIn eImwn qwVI lwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਦੀਨ ਈਮਾਨ ਤਾੜੀ ਲਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions are worshipping the Lord according to their own religious traditions.

transliteration.english: lakh lakh dheen ieemaan taaRee laavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख दीन ईमान ताड़ी लावही।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh dheen ieemaan taaRee laavahee|
transliteration.hi: लख लख दीन ईमान ताड़ी लावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ d̪in eimɑn t̪ɑɽi lɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ دیٍن ایمان تاڑیِ لاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Only through loving devotion one can merge in the Lord, the absolute truth.
With loving devotion, all is futile
Millions of spiritualists and emperors confuse the public.

verse.gurmukhi: jog Bog lK rwh sMig clwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਜੋਗ ਭੋਗ ਲਖ ਰਾਹ ਸੰਗਿ ਚਲਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions adopt yoga and bhog (enjoyment) simultaneously

transliteration.english: jog bhog lakh raeh sa(n)g chalaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: जोग भोग लख राह संगि चलावही।
transliteration.en: jog bhog lakh raeh sa(n)g chalaavahee|
transliteration.hi: जोग भोग लख राह संगि चलावही।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒɔG ɓɔG ləkʰ rɑh səŋG t͡ʃəlɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: جوگ بھوگ لکھ راه سںگ چلاوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: dIn dunI Asgwh hwQ n pwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਦੀਨ ਦੁਨੀ ਅਸਗਾਹ ਹਾਥ ਨ ਪਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: But they cannot fathom the divine who is beyond all the religions and the world.

transliteration.english: dheen dhunee asagaeh haath na paavahee|
transliteration.hindi: दीन दुनी असगाह हाथ न पावही।
transliteration.en: dheen dhunee asagaeh haath na paavahee|
transliteration.hi: दीन दुनी असगाह हाथ न पावही।
transliteration.ipa: d̪in d̪ʊni əsəGɑh hɑt̪ʰ nə pɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: دیٍن دُنیِ اسگاه هاتھ ن پاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Myriads of servants serve him

verse.gurmukhi: AMqu n isPiq slwh AwiK suxwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਲਾਹ ਆਖਿ ਸੁਣਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: But their praises and eulogies cannot know his extent.

transliteration.english: a(n)t na sifat salaeh aakh sunaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: अंतु न सिफति सलाह आखि सुणावही।
transliteration.en: a(n)t na sifat salaeh aakh sunaavahee|
transliteration.hi: अंतु न सिफति सलाह आखि सुणावही।
transliteration.ipa: əŋt̪ nə sɪfət̪ səlɑh əɑkʰ sʊɳɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: اںت ن سپھت سلاه آکھ سُݨاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: All standing at His court adore that anxiety-free Lord.
With loving devotion, all is futile
Many masters and leaders come and go.
Many majestic courts exist and their stores are so full of wealth
That continuous counting goes on there (to avoid any deficiency).
Many becoming helping hand to many families are sticking to their words and protect their reputation.
Many, controlled by greed, infatuation and ego, go on swindling and cheating.
Many are there who talking and discoursing sweetly wander in all the ten directions.
Millions are old people who are still swinging their mind in the hopes and desires.

verse.gurmukhi: 10 : Bwau Bgiq qoN Cu`t hor prcy
verse.unicode: ੧੦ : ਭਾਉ ਭਗਤਿ ਤੋਂ ਛੁੱਟ ਹੋਰ ਪਰਚੇ

en.bdb: Without loving devotion all else is is futile

transliteration.english: 10 : bhaau bhagat to(n) chhu'T hor parache
transliteration.hindi: १० : भाउ भगति तों छुट्ट होर परचे
transliteration.en: 10 : bhaau bhagat to(n) chhu'T hor parache
transliteration.hi: १० : भाउ भगति तों छुट्ट होर परचे
transliteration.ipa: 1ə0 : ɓɑo ɓəGət̪ t̪ɔⁿ ɕʊʈ hɔr pərət͡ʃe
transliteration.ur: ۱۰ : بھاا بھگت توں چھُّٹ هور پرچے

verse.gurmukhi: lK dwqy dwqwr mMig mMig dyvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਦਾਤੇ ਦਾਤਾਰ ਮੰਗਿ ਮੰਗਿ ਦੇਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions are the generous persons who beg and bestow upon others.

transliteration.english: lakh dhaate dhaataar ma(n)g ma(n)g dhevahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख दाते दातार मंगि मंगि देवही।
transliteration.en: lakh dhaate dhaataar ma(n)g ma(n)g dhevahee|
transliteration.hi: लख दाते दातार मंगि मंगि देवही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ d̪ɑt̪e d̪ɑt̪ɑr məŋG məŋG d̪eʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ داتے داتار مںگ مںگ دےوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Millions are incarnations (of gods) who having born have performed many acts
Many boatmen have rowed but none could know the extent and end of the world ocean.
The thinkers also could know nothing about His mystery.
The thinkers also could know nothing about His mystery.
Millions are eating and feeding others and
Millions are there who are serving the transcendental Lord and also in the courts of worldly kings.

verse.gurmukhi: 11 : Bwau Bgiq qoN Cu`t hor prcy
verse.unicode: ੧੧ : ਭਾਉ ਭਗਤਿ ਤੋਂ ਛੁੱਟ ਹੋਰ ਪਰਚੇ

en.bdb: Nothing without loving devotion

transliteration.english: 11 : bhaau bhagat to(n) chhu'T hor parache
transliteration.hindi: ११ : भाउ भगति तों छुट्ट होर परचे
transliteration.en: 11 : bhaau bhagat to(n) chhu'T hor parache
transliteration.hi: ११ : भाउ भगति तों छुट्ट होर परचे
transliteration.ipa: 1ə1 : ɓɑo ɓəGət̪ t̪ɔⁿ ɕʊʈ hɔr pərət͡ʃe
transliteration.ur: ۱۱ : بھاا بھگت توں چھُّٹ هور پرچے

en.bdb: The valiant soldiers show their powers

verse.gurmukhi: suix suix surqy lK AwiK suxwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਰਤੇ ਲਖ ਆਖਿ ਸੁਣਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions of the listeners explain His praises.

transliteration.english: sun sun surate lakh aakh sunaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: सुणि सुणि सुरते लख आखि सुणावही।
transliteration.en: sun sun surate lakh aakh sunaavahee|
transliteration.hi: सुणि सुणि सुरते लख आखि सुणावही।
transliteration.ipa: sʊɳ sʊɳ sʊrət̪e ləkʰ əɑkʰ sʊɳɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: سُݨ سُݨ سُرتے لکھ آکھ سُݨاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Researchers also run in all the ten directions.

verse.gurmukhi: icr jIvY lK hoie n EVku pwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਚਿਰ ਜੀਵੈ ਲਖ ਹੋਇ ਨ ਓੜਕੁ ਪਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions of long-lived ones have happened but none could know the mystery of that Lord

transliteration.english: chir jeevai lakh hoi na oRak paavahee|
transliteration.hindi: चिर जीवै लख होइ न ओड़कु पावही।
transliteration.en: chir jeevai lakh hoi na oRak paavahee|
transliteration.hi: चिर जीवै लख होइ न ओड़कु पावही।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃɪr d͡ʒiʋæ ləkʰ hɔeɪ nə oəɽək pɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: چِر جیِوَے لکھ هوا ن اوڑک پاوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: Kry isAwxy hoie n mnu smJwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਖਰੇ ਸਿਆਣੇ ਹੋਇ ਨ ਮਨੁ ਸਮਝਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Even being clever, people do not make their minds understand (the futility of rituals and other allied hypocrisies)

transliteration.english: khare siaane hoi na man samajhaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: खरे सिआणे होइ न मनु समझावही।
transliteration.en: khare siaane hoi na man samajhaavahee|
transliteration.hi: खरे सिआणे होइ न मनु समझावही।
transliteration.ipa: kʰəre sɪəɑɳe hɔeɪ nə mən səməɖ͡ʐɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: کھرے سآݨے هوا ن من سمجھاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: And ultimately get punished at the court of the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: 12 : KudI dy du`K sbr dy suK
verse.unicode: ੧੨ : ਖੁਦੀ ਦੇ ਦੁੱਖ ਸਬਰ ਦੇ ਸੁਖ

en.bdb: Sufferings of ego and delights of contentment

transliteration.english: 12 : khudhee dhe dhu'kh sabar dhe sukh
transliteration.hindi: १२ : खुदी दे दुक्ख सबर दे सुख
transliteration.en: 12 : khudhee dhe dhu'kh sabar dhe sukh
transliteration.hi: १२ : खुदी दे दुक्ख सबर दे सुख
transliteration.ipa: 1ə2 : kʰʊd̪i d̪e d̪ʊkʰ səbər d̪e sʊkʰ
transliteration.ur: ۱۲ : کھُدیِ دے دُّکھ سبر دے سُکھ

en.bdb: Physicians prepare myriads of prescriptions.
Millions of people full of wisdom adopt many a resolution.
Many enemies unwittingly go on increasing their enmity.

verse.gurmukhi: liV liV krin muhIm Awpu gxwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲੜਿ ਲੜਿ ਕਰਨਿ ਮੁਹੀਮ ਆਪੁ ਗਣਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: They march for fightings and thus show their ego

transliteration.english: laR laR karan muheem aap ganaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लड़ि लड़ि करनि मुहीम आपु गणावही।
transliteration.en: laR laR karan muheem aap ganaavahee|
transliteration.hi: लड़ि लड़ि करनि मुहीम आपु गणावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləɽ ləɽ kərən mʊhim əɑp Gəɳɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لڑ لڑِ کرن مُهیِم آپ گݨاوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: hoie jdId kdIm n KudI imtwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਹੋਇ ਜਦੀਦ ਕਦੀਮ ਨ ਖੁਦੀ ਮਿਟਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: From youth, though, they step in old age yet their egotism is not effaced.

transliteration.english: hoi jadheedh kadheem na khudhee miTaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: होइ जदीद कदीम न खुदी मिटावही।
transliteration.en: hoi jadheedh kadheem na khudhee miTaavahee|
transliteration.hi: होइ जदीद कदीम न खुदी मिटावही।
transliteration.ipa: hɔeɪ d͡ʒəd̪id̪ kəd̪im nə kʰʊd̪i mɪʈɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: هوا جدیِد کدیِم ن کھُدیِ مٹاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Only the contented and the humble lose their sense of egocentricity.
Negation of self conceit is the salvation

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK pIr murId myl imlwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਪੀਰ ਮੁਰੀਦ ਮੇਲ ਮਿਲਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Lacs of spiritualists and their disciples assemble.

transliteration.english: lakh lakh peer mureedh mel milaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख पीर मुरीद मेल मिलावही।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh peer mureedh mel milaavahee|
transliteration.hi: लख लख पीर मुरीद मेल मिलावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ pir mʊrid̪ mel mɪlɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ پیِر مُریِد مےل ملاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Myriads of beggers ave pilgrimages at the martyries.

verse.gurmukhi: lK rojy lK eId invwj krwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਰੋਜੇ ਲਖ ਈਦ ਨਿਵਾਜ ਕਰਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Millions of people observe fasts (roza) and offer namaz (prayer) of id.

transliteration.english: lakh roje lakh ieedh nivaaj karaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: लख रोजे लख ईद निवाज करावही।
transliteration.en: lakh roje lakh ieedh nivaaj karaavahee|
transliteration.hi: लख रोजे लख ईद निवाज करावही।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ rɔd͡ʒe ləkʰ eid̪ nɪʋɑd͡ʒ kərɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: لکھ روجے لکھ اید نواج کراوهیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: kir kir guPq sunId mn prcwvhI[
verse.unicode: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਫਤ ਸੁਨੀਦ ਮਨ ਪਰਚਾਵਹੀ।

en.bdb: Many entice their minds by being busy in questioning and answering.

transliteration.english: kar kar gufat suneedh man parachaavahee|
transliteration.hindi: करि करि गुफत सुनीद मन परचावही।
transliteration.en: kar kar gufat suneedh man parachaavahee|
transliteration.hi: करि करि गुफत सुनीद मन परचावही।
transliteration.ipa: kər kər Gʊfət̪ sʊnid̪ mən pərət͡ʃɑʋəhi.
transliteration.ur: کر کرِ گُپھت سُنیِد من پرچاوهیِ۔

en.bdb: Many are engaged in preparing the key of evotion for opening the lock of mind's temple.

verse.gurmukhi: dir drvys rsId n Awpu jxwvhI ]13]
verse.unicode: ਦਰਿ ਦਰਵੇਸ ਰਸੀਦ ਨ ਆਪੁ ਜਣਾਵਹੀ ॥੧੩॥

en.bdb: But those Who by becoming dervish at the door of Lord have become acceptable, never show their individuality.

transliteration.english: dhar dharaves raseedh na aap janaavahee ||13||
transliteration.hindi: दरि दरवेस रसीद न आपु जणावही ॥१३॥
transliteration.en: dhar dharaves raseedh na aap janaavahee ||13||
transliteration.hi: दरि दरवेस रसीद न आपु जणावही ॥१३॥
transliteration.ipa: d̪ər d̪ərəʋes rəsid̪ nə əɑp d͡ʒəɳɑʋəhi.1ə3.
transliteration.ur: در دروےس رسیِد ن آپ جݨاوهیِ ۔۔۱۳۔۔

en.bdb: Ugly are the people indulged in delusion
Tall palaces are erected and carpets are spread therein,
To get counted amongst, the high-ups.

verse.gurmukhi: kir gV kot hjwr rwj kmwvxy[
verse.unicode: ਕਰਿ ਗੜ ਕੋਟ ਹਜਾਰ ਰਾਜ ਕਮਾਵਣੇ।

en.bdb: Constructing thousands of forts people rule over them

transliteration.english: kar gaR koT hajaar raaj kamaavane|
transliteration.hindi: करि गड़ कोट हजार राज कमावणे।
transliteration.en: kar gaR koT hajaar raaj kamaavane|
transliteration.hi: करि गड़ कोट हजार राज कमावणे।
transliteration.ipa: kər Gəɽ kɔʈ həd͡ʒɑr rɑd͡ʒ kəmɑʋəɳe.
transliteration.ur: کر گڑ کوٹ هجار راج کماوݨے۔

en.bdb: And millions of officers sing panegyrics in the honour of their rulers.
Such people full of their self-esteems go on transmigrating from
And to this world and look uglier in the true court of the Lord.
Hypocrisy does not avail there
Millions of bathings at pilgrimage centres on auspicious occasions;
Serving at the places of gods and goddesses;

verse.gurmukhi: jp qp sMjm lK swiD sDwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਜਪ ਤਪ ਸੰਜਮ ਲਖ ਸਾਧਿ ਸਧਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Observance of austerities and millions of praxis by being meditative and full of continence

transliteration.english: jap tap sa(n)jam lakh saadh sadhaavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: जप तप संजम लख साधि सधावणा।
transliteration.en: jap tap sa(n)jam lakh saadh sadhaavanaa|
transliteration.hi: जप तप संजम लख साधि सधावणा।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒəp t̪əp səŋd͡ʒəm ləkʰ sɑt̪ə̀ sət̪ɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: جپ تپ سںجم لکھ سادھ سدھاوݨا۔

en.bdb: Offerings through yajn and horns etc;

verse.gurmukhi: vrq nym lK dwn krm kmwvxw[
verse.unicode: ਵਰਤ ਨੇਮ ਲਖ ਦਾਨ ਕਰਮ ਕਮਾਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Fasts, dos and donots and millions of charities (for the sake of show business)

transliteration.english: varat nem lakh dhaan karam kamaavanaa|
transliteration.hindi: वरत नेम लख दान करम कमावणा।
transliteration.en: varat nem lakh dhaan karam kamaavanaa|
transliteration.hi: वरत नेम लख दान करम कमावणा।
transliteration.ipa: ʋərət̪ nem ləkʰ d̪ɑn kərəm kəmɑʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: ورت نےم لکھ دان کرم کماوݨا۔

en.bdb: Have absolutely no meaning in that true court of the Lord.
Man of the Lord's court is the highest
Millions of leather bags (boats) go on floating on water

verse.gurmukhi: EVk EVk Bwil suiD n lhMdIAw[
verse.unicode: ਓੜਕ ਓੜਕ ਭਾਲਿ ਸੁਧਿ ਨ ਲਹੰਦੀਆ।

en.bdb: But even searching the vast ocean they do not find possible to know the ends of the ocean.

transliteration.english: oRak oRak bhaal sudh na laha(n)dheeaa|
transliteration.hindi: ओड़क ओड़क भालि सुधि न लहंदीआ।
transliteration.en: oRak oRak bhaal sudh na laha(n)dheeaa|
transliteration.hi: ओड़क ओड़क भालि सुधि न लहंदीआ।
transliteration.ipa: oəɽək oəɽək ɓɑl sʊt̪ə̀ nə ləhəŋd̪iəɑ.
transliteration.ur: اوڑک اوڑک بھال سُدھ ن لهںدیِآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: Anl mnl kir iKAwl aumig aufMdIAW[
verse.unicode: ਅਨਲ ਮਨਲ ਕਰਿ ਖਿਆਲ ਉਮਗਿ ਉਡੰਦੀਆਂ।

en.bdb: The lines of anil birds fly high to know about the sky but their jumps and

transliteration.english: anal manal kar khiaal umag udda(n)dheeaa(n)|
transliteration.hindi: अनल मनल करि खिआल उमगि उडंदीआँ।
transliteration.en: anal manal kar khiaal umag udda(n)dheeaa(n)|
transliteration.hi: अनल मनल करि खिआल उमगि उडंदीआँ।
transliteration.ipa: ənəl mənəl kər kʰɪəɑl oʊməG oʊɖəŋd̪iəɑⁿ.
transliteration.ur: انل منل کر کھآل اُمگ اُڈںدیِآں۔

verse.gurmukhi: auCil krin auCwl n auiB cVHMdIAw[
verse.unicode: ਉਛਲਿ ਕਰਨਿ ਉਛਾਲ ਨ ਉਭਿ ਚੜ੍ਹੰਦੀਆ।

en.bdb: Upward flights do not take them to the highest borders of sky.

transliteration.english: auchhal karan uchhaal na ubh chaRha(n)dheeaa|
transliteration.hindi: उछलि करनि उछाल न उभि चड़्हंदीआ।
transliteration.en: auchhal karan uchhaal na ubh chaRha(n)dheeaa|
transliteration.hi: उछलि करनि उछाल न उभि चड़्हंदीआ।
transliteration.ipa: oʊɕəl kərən oʊɕɑl nə oʊɓ t͡ʃəɽʰəŋd̪iəɑ.
transliteration.ur: اُچھل کرن اُچھال ن اُبھ چڑھںدیِآ۔

en.bdb: Millions of skies and nether worlds (and their inhabitants) are beggars before Him and
Before the servants of God's court are nothing more than a particle of dust.
Creation of the wondrous Lord Vahiguru

verse.gurmukhi: qRRY gux mwieAw Kylu kir dyKwilAw[
verse.unicode: ਤ੍ਰ੍ਰੈ ਗੁਣ ਮਾਇਆ ਖੇਲੁ ਕਰਿ ਦੇਖਾਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: The Lord has produced this world as the play of the three dimensional maya.

transliteration.english: trrai gun maiaa khel kar dhekhaaliaa|
transliteration.hindi: त्र्रै गुण माइआ खेलु करि देखालिआ।
transliteration.en: trrai gun maiaa khel kar dhekhaaliaa|
transliteration.hi: त्र्रै गुण माइआ खेलु करि देखालिआ।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɹɹæ Gʊɳ mɑɪɑ kʰel kər d̪ekʰɑlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: تررَے گُݨ مااآ کھےل کر دےکھالآ۔

en.bdb: He has accomplished the feat of (the creation of) four life mines (egg, foetus, sweat, vegetation) and four speeches (pars, pasyanti, madhyama and vaikhar).
Creating from the five elements he bound them all in a divine law.

verse.gurmukhi: iCA ruiq bwrh mwh isrij smHwilAw[
verse.unicode: ਛਿਅ ਰੁਤਿ ਬਾਰਹ ਮਾਹ ਸਿਰਜਿ ਸਮ੍ਹਾਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: He created and sustained the six seasons and the twelve months.

transliteration.english: chhia rut baareh maeh siraj samhaaliaa|
transliteration.hindi: छिअ रुति बारह माह सिरजि सम्हालिआ।
transliteration.en: chhia rut baareh maeh siraj samhaaliaa|
transliteration.hi: छिअ रुति बारह माह सिरजि सम्हालिआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɕɪə rʊt̪ bɑrəh mɑh sɪrəd͡ʒ səmʰɑlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: چھِا رُت باره ماه سرج سمھالآ۔

en.bdb: For day and night He lit the sun and the moon as lamps.
With one vibrational throb he expanded the whole creation and delighted it through his graceful glance.
He is detached
With one word (sound) the Lord creates the universe and destroyes it.

verse.gurmukhi: iqdUM lK drIAwau n EVku jwpdw[
verse.unicode: ਤਿਦੂੰ ਲਖ ਦਰੀਆਉ ਨ ਓੜਕੁ ਜਾਪਦਾ।

en.bdb: From that very Lord myriads of life streams have emerged and there is no end to them.

transliteration.english: tidhoo(n) lakh dhareeaau na oRak jaapadhaa|
transliteration.hindi: तिदूँ लख दरीआउ न ओड़कु जापदा।
transliteration.en: tidhoo(n) lakh dhareeaau na oRak jaapadhaa|
transliteration.hi: तिदूँ लख दरीआउ न ओड़कु जापदा।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪd̪uŋ ləkʰ d̪əriəɑo nə oəɽək d͡ʒɑpəd̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: تِدُوں لکھ دریِآا ن اوڑک جاپدا۔

verse.gurmukhi: lK bRhmMf smwau n lhir ivAwpdw[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਬ੍ਰਹਮੰਡ ਸਮਾਉ ਨ ਲਹਰਿ ਵਿਆਪਦਾ।

en.bdb: Millions of universes subsume in Him but He is uninfluenced by any of them.

transliteration.english: lakh brahama(n)dd samaau na lahar viaapadhaa|
transliteration.hindi: लख ब्रहमंड समाउ न लहरि विआपदा।
transliteration.en: lakh brahama(n)dd samaau na lahar viaapadhaa|
transliteration.hi: लख ब्रहमंड समाउ न लहरि विआपदा।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ bɹəhəməŋɖ səmɑo nə ləhər ʋɪəɑpəd̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: لکھ برهمںڈ سماا ن لهر وآپدا۔

verse.gurmukhi: kir kir vyKY cwau lK prqwpdw[
verse.unicode: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਵੇਖੈ ਚਾਉ ਲਖ ਪਰਤਾਪਦਾ।

en.bdb: He sees His own activities with great enthusiasm and makes many a man glorious

transliteration.english: kar kar vekhai chaau lakh parataapadhaa|
transliteration.hindi: करि करि वेखै चाउ लख परतापदा।
transliteration.en: kar kar vekhai chaau lakh parataapadhaa|
transliteration.hi: करि करि वेखै चाउ लख परतापदा।
transliteration.ipa: kər kər ʋekʰæ t͡ʃɑo ləkʰ pərət̪ɑpəd̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: کر کرِ وےکھَے چاا لکھ پرتاپدا۔

verse.gurmukhi: kaux krY ArQwau vr n srwp dw[
verse.unicode: ਕਉਣ ਕਰੈ ਅਰਥਾਉ ਵਰ ਨ ਸਰਾਪ ਦਾ।

en.bdb: Who can decode the mystery and meaning of the principle of His boons and curses?

transliteration.english: kaun karai arathaau var na saraap dhaa|
transliteration.hindi: कउण करै अरथाउ वर न सराप दा।
transliteration.en: kaun karai arathaau var na saraap dhaa|
transliteration.hi: कउण करै अरथाउ वर न सराप दा।
transliteration.ipa: koʊɳ kəræ ərət̪ʰɑo ʋər nə sərɑp d̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: کاݨ کرَے ارتھاا ور ن سراپ دا۔

verse.gurmukhi: lhY n pCoqwau puMn n pwp dw ]18]
verse.unicode: ਲਹੈ ਨ ਪਛੋਤਾਉ ਪੁੰਨ ਨ ਪਾਪ ਦਾ ॥੧੮॥

en.bdb: He accepts not only the (mental) repentance of sins and virtues (and accepts the good deeds).

transliteration.english: lahai na pachhotaau pu(n)n na paap dhaa ||18||
transliteration.hindi: लहै न पछोताउ पुँन न पाप दा ॥१८॥
transliteration.en: lahai na pachhotaau pu(n)n na paap dhaa ||18||
transliteration.hi: लहै न पछोताउ पुँन न पाप दा ॥१८॥
transliteration.ipa: ləhæ nə pəɕɔt̪ɑo pʊŋn nə pɑp d̪ɑ.1ə8.
transliteration.ur: لهَے ن پچھوتاا پُنّ ن پاپ دا ۔۔۱۸۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: 19 : kudrq qy kwdr byAMq Asgwh hY
verse.unicode: ੧੯ : ਕੁਦਰਤ ਤੇ ਕਾਦਰ ਬੇਅੰਤ ਅਸਗਾਹ ਹੈ

en.bdb: The creator and His creation are infinite

transliteration.english: 19 : kudharat te kaadhar bea(n)t asagaeh hai
transliteration.hindi: १९ : कुदरत ते कादर बेअंत असगाह है
transliteration.en: 19 : kudharat te kaadhar bea(n)t asagaeh hai
transliteration.hi: १९ : कुदरत ते कादर बेअंत असगाह है
transliteration.ipa: 1ə9 : kʊd̪ərət̪ t̪e kɑd̪ər beəŋt̪ əsəGɑh hæ
transliteration.ur: ۱۹ : کُدرت تے کادر بےاںت اسگاه هَے

verse.gurmukhi: kudriq Agmu AQwhu AMqu n pweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਅਗਮੁ ਅਥਾਹੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: Creation, the power of the Lord is unrpproachable and unfathomable.

transliteration.english: kudharat agam athaahu a(n)t na paieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: कुदरति अगमु अथाहु अंतु न पाईऐ।
transliteration.en: kudharat agam athaahu a(n)t na paieeaai|
transliteration.hi: कुदरति अगमु अथाहु अंतु न पाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: kʊd̪ərət̪ əGəm ət̪ʰɑh əŋt̪ nə pɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: کُدرت اگم اتھاهُ اںت ن پاایاَے۔

en.bdb: Nobody can know its extent. That creator is without any anxiety;how could He be persuaded and amused.
How the majesty of His court could be described.

verse.gurmukhi: koie n dsY rwhu ikqu ibiD jweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਕੋਇ ਨ ਦਸੈ ਰਾਹੁ ਕਿਤੁ ਬਿਧਿ ਜਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: None is there to tell the way and means leading to Him.

transliteration.english: koi na dhasai raahu kit bidh jaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: कोइ न दसै राहु कितु बिधि जाईऐ।
transliteration.en: koi na dhasai raahu kit bidh jaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: कोइ न दसै राहु कितु बिधि जाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: kɔeɪ nə d̪əsæ rɑh kɪt̪ bɪt̪ə̀ d͡ʒɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: کوا ن دسَے راهُ کت بدھ جاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: kyvfu isPiq slwh ikau kir iDAweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਲਾਹ ਕਿਉ ਕਰਿ ਧਿਆਈਐ।

en.bdb: This is also incomprehensible that how infinite are his eulogies and how should He be concentrated upon.

transliteration.english: kevadd sifat salaeh kiau kar dhiaaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: केवडु सिफति सलाह किउ करि धिआईऐ।
transliteration.en: kevadd sifat salaeh kiau kar dhiaaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: केवडु सिफति सलाह किउ करि धिआईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: keʋəɖ sɪfət̪ səlɑh kɪo kər t̪ɪəɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: کےوڈ سپھت سلاه کا کر دھآایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: Aibgiq giq Asgwhu n AlKu lKweIAY ]19]
verse.unicode: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਸਗਾਹੁ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾਈਐ ॥੧੯॥

en.bdb: The dynamics of the Lord is unmanifest, deep and unfathomable; it cannot be known.

transliteration.english: abigat gat asagaahu na alakh lakhaieeaai ||19||
transliteration.hindi: अबिगति गति असगाहु न अलखु लखाईऐ ॥१९॥
transliteration.en: abigat gat asagaahu na alakh lakhaieeaai ||19||
transliteration.hi: अबिगति गति असगाहु न अलखु लखाईऐ ॥१९॥
transliteration.ipa: əbɪGət̪ Gət̪ əsəGɑh nə ələkʰ ləkʰɑeiæ.1ə9.
transliteration.ur: ابگت گتِ اسگاهُ ن الکھ لکھاایاَے ۔۔۱۹۔۔

en.bdb: Only grace of the lord desired
The primeval Lord is said to be the supreme wonder.

verse.gurmukhi: Awid AnIlu Anwid sbdu n swKIAY[
verse.unicode: ਆਦਿ ਅਨੀਲੁ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਨ ਸਾਖੀਐ।

en.bdb: The words also fail to tell about the beginning of that beginningless.

transliteration.english: aadh aneel anaadh sabadh na saakheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: आदि अनीलु अनादि सबदु न साखीऐ।
transliteration.en: aadh aneel anaadh sabadh na saakheeaai|
transliteration.hi: आदि अनीलु अनादि सबदु न साखीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: əɑd̪ ənil ənɑd̪ səbəd̪ nə sɑkʰiæ.
transliteration.ur: آد انیِل اناد سبد ن ساکھیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: vrqY Awid jugwid n glI gwKIAY[
verse.unicode: ਵਰਤੈ ਆਦਿ ਜੁਗਾਦਿ ਨ ਗਲੀ ਗਾਖੀਐ।

en.bdb: He operates in the time and even before the time primordial and mere discussions cannot explain Him.

transliteration.english: varatai aadh jugaadh na galee gaakheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: वरतै आदि जुगादि न गली गाखीऐ।
transliteration.en: varatai aadh jugaadh na galee gaakheeaai|
transliteration.hi: वरतै आदि जुगादि न गली गाखीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: ʋərət̪æ əɑd̪ d͡ʒʊGɑd̪ nə Gəli Gɑkʰiæ.
transliteration.ur: ورتَے آد جُگاد ن گلیِ گاکھیِاَے۔

en.bdb: He, the protector and lover of the devotees is undeceivable known by the name of the equipoise.
The desire of the consciousness is to remain merged in His unstruck melody heard in the trance.
He, being full of all dimensions, is the wonder of the wonders.
Now the only desire remains that the grace of the perfect Guru be with me (so that I may realise the Lord).
